content.detailedDescription: Left a high football game. driving east about one mile from football game i saw something above a house. i was the only car on the  road that was very odd. no traffic. i drove to the front of the house there it was. it was huge. about two and one half football fields in size. i stopped  my car. i sat there watching it. no sound and no movement. i was so scared. i couldn't take my eyes off of it. for some reason i opened the car door and got out. i am not sure how long i stood there. i could not move. all this time no cars at all. 8:30 to 9:00 it wasn't real dark you could see around you. there were no outside lights on. there was no inside lights anywhere i could see. then all of the sudden i heard a voice say leave right now. it was like i woke up. i got into my car as i was leaving it was still there. i flew home which was about ten miles away.  more 2 hours had past. i was looking at it for 2 hours. i just remember, looking at it. i believe i was in some kind of a trance.
content.summary: Round. it had at 3 stories and windows. no lights and no sound. just sat there just above a house.

content.detailedDescription:
Triangle craft with 3 bright lights traveling low and fast

i was driving home saturday night (10:45 p.M.) april 1, 2017, on a quiet back road and while i drove up a hill close to my home i saw two bright white lights sitting in the sky almost like stadium lights. as i drove closer to the lights and closer to my home i saw that there was actually 3 white lights and the lights formed the shape of a triangle.

it is hard to estimate the size of the craft and the height of it but this craft was lower than any other plane that i've seen in my life. i stopped in the middle of the road to try and take a picture, at this point i realize the craft is moving and is moving pretty quickly southeast. i quickly take one picture that didn't turn out well and drove quickly to my home about 200 yards away, i race inside to gather the attention of my family and by the time i got my family and i out on the deck the craft had just passed over the tree line.

the night sky was clear there were very little clouds in the sky so the visibility was clear the moon was in a waxing crescent phase so it wasn't giving off much light. the 3 white lights of the craft were extremely bright, brighter than any star or plane i've seen.
content.summary: Driving at night stopped to look at 3 almost stadium lights in the sky in a triangle formation

content.detailedDescription: (779) 206-8514. was watching live feed of iss when astronauts on walk start acting suspiciously began pointing camera to deck of ship . in the clips i gathered you can see the astronaut following object with eyes after reflection on visor object turns  90 degrees and back tracks behind astronaut where object comes into view from left to right. you can see the astronaut getting ready to position camera after craft goes by craft and astronaut in full view i have still frames and the video of this event it show the systematic changes of camera angle to avoid object on screen . the astronauts plural that were outside to witness this made no such attempt to notify anyone of craft. the views are in high definition and object displays property's of other anomalys caught some form of gravitational interference. i watch the skies on a consistent basis this is clear evidence of intelligent flight.
content.summary: Was watching feed of iss

content.detailedDescription: In the early 1960's when i was just a little boy i saw and experienced a cube shaped ufo hovering over a barn in hopewell nj as we were driving home to ewing township from the flemington fair. this ufo had flashing and pulsing lights on it and round portholes (windows) in the center. it was so close to the side of the road i could have thrown a rock at it and maybe hit it! when we drove by this cube shaped ufo i totally lost my ability to move and talk until we got home. my father was driving and he stopped talking and drove home without saying a word like a freaken zombie. he never saw it or remembered seeing it. when we got home i burst out crying! not because i saw this ufo but because i could not talk or move for aprox 30 minutes. my mom started yelling at my dad saying what did you do to him to make him hysterical? he really could not remember a thing and he only snapped out of it after arriving home as i did! anyway i never even heard of ufo's when i was that young but afterwards it didn't take long to put 2+2 together and i have been a believer ever since! this is my story and i swear on my life that it is 100 percent true and every time i re-think this experience i get major shivers all the way up my spine!
content.summary: My up close ufo encounter and experience with my father in the early 1960's

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were outside, in the backyard, looking at the stars, because the sky was unusually clear. we had been observing the stars and constellations for approx. five minutes when the object appeared, suddenly, out of the west, headed east out over the ocean there is this extremely fast, at extremely high altitude, brightly (white) lit object that transits the sky in less than ten seconds...  stops... remained motionless for a few seconds, then flew southwest back inland making erratic movements, kind of jittery and zig-zaggy, then abruptly stopped again and remained motionless. the speed was incredible.The object then flew south/southwest until it was lost in the illumination (glow) of the city lights of daytona beach.
 
i was an air force brat, and a veteran of 14 yrs military service in the us army, and have seen all types of high performance military aircraft flying... this was not a plane or satellite.
never seen anything remotely this fast. it made erratic changes in direction, and complete stops with no perceptible slowing. 

i'm actually a very rational person. a highly trained and experienced observer. i've seen the iss, space shuttle, fighters fueling from tankers, high performance aircraft,and numerous satellites over the years... never anything like this. at first we were excited, as we thought it was a satellite, then our feelings turned to awe as we watched it perform incredible maneuvers, radically changing direct, coming to abrupt stops, all from very high rates of speed.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: An illuminated object flew in multiple directions across the sky at an extremely high altitude, and high rate of speed.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was returning home feom being out with friends, i went inside my house and grabbed a liggter for a cigarette outside. i started smoking, the skies were bright red, the clouds were moving at a fast pace... i looked up and saw what appeared to be a huge disc over head, and 2 others at a mugmch higger elevation, but the one overhead was huge. i witneessed briggt lights that looked like squares underneath of it. there was also lighting and thunder, and when the lighting flashed i would see a huge glimpse of what i couldnt believe it was a disc saucer. it made me fearful, scared, and i felt static like i feel and hear electricity at that moment, i also remember feeling a connection, as if i was hearing someone telling me to tell others. i stood in disbelief snd in shock for abt 4 minutes, they didnt move, and i didnt move... at some point which is harder to remember, i almost screamed in ny head and i went inside i grabbed my younger brother jeffery. i said you have to see this, and i told my other brothers to come outside and see it. i have 4 bros. my 3 bros were playing video games including jeff. jeff was the only one to come outside with me, and he witnessed it as well! he was in disbelief and in shock and will tell u similar details, if u contact him, he is the only one who was with me. after we saw it, i became scared as if they would take me and i ran inside and i passed out and fell asleep...
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 3 ufos witnessed by myself and my brother

content.detailedDescription: I was on large open parking lot smoking a cigar and noticed what appeared to be three jets in tight formation heading north from the reading pa area towards hamburg pa. two of the jets where the same and it appeared that there was a large drone size jet in the middle. as the jets passed the third smaller craft just disappeared. the two flanking crafts seemed to stay on the same course and trajectory until out of sight.
content.summary: Triangular in shape smaller than the 2 military jets escorting the craft. about 1/3 in size

content.detailedDescription:
For many days a star was low hanging and followed me. i felt everything was going to change and i would be leaving. i watched this star and suddenly my face appeared.  
it lasted maybe a minute. people from the government knew this was happening. if u decide to investigate,u will be entering into areas of national security. the story gets more unusual but i fear u will think i am crazy.  trust me if u help me, u will find the most amazing discovery and the best kept secret of our government.  u seem like people who are willing to go out on a limb. please help.
content.summary: Star turned into face. not crazy

content.detailedDescription:
This sort of stuff can only happen to me. after my life was threatened one too many times in greater los angeles, i went up i-5 and saw the lemore nas sign. i remembered art bell’s show had discussed the place, so i grabbed a room at the super 8 in kettleman city, ca.

i’m a writer as well as a licensed clinical social worker (lcsw) in my “past life,” so i got up early to write on the morning of, as best as i can recall, august 8, 2008, or cutely 08-08-08. as my motel coffee brewed sometime between 4 and 5 a.M. i was admiring the clear predawn sky when what i thought was a shooting star descended. my first “micro thought” was “kind of slow.” i did my exhale of appreciation as it dropped behind the motel sign.

next?

the object shot up into the sky where it had started in the time of a finger snap. i exclaimed, “my shooting star just did a u-turn!” then came the “air show” of what the ufo community calls powered or “intelligent maneuvers.” it seemed i could talk to the object, it heard me, and responded. i said, “aw, i’ve seen that before” during an acrobatic routine i had long ago concluded was a 1986 u.S. military “drone show” to have me ranting about “flying saucers.”

this craft did some of the same tricks, but also stood still. thus, i could perceive a hull. definitely not “swamp gas,” and not a cloud or anything but a spacecraft. as i mentioned on the phone, i think a private company built this craft and they fly it out there. it may be stored at lemore, where the navy base has no water or airplanes, but they sure have plush base housing. i was questioned by a navy police officer for taking a photo of the bus stop off the base which he directed me to delete from my later seized by lawmen, stolen, and ultimately stored by crazed criminal kinfolk fuji digital camera. not fiction; all truth.

i later saw a “conference charlatan” who sells a lot of books hanging around the motel. if you want a name, get me to my long overdue movie deal meeting. i’m tired of being trapped in substandard motels over this sighting and much more. i suspect the craft is like a “scout ship” that can exceed the speed of light. it made no sound whatsoever and imitated a 737 as it glided over a mountain range to end the show. i will never forget that night. hope you share this and have a comment or two. i do still have a photo of what i jokingly called an “alien landing strip” out there. we might wonder together why a female in a military uniform drove by in a small pickup truck before i took the photo. this is called “psy op” and “disinformation.” there are no e.T.’s folks, and i fear the astro-fools headed to mars on orion won’t make it back alive.

have a great california day…i hate it out there!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: An apparent meteor performed like a spacecraft.

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I was on top of the montain first i saw 
something come throw me after some hour
it goas far away an after some secend
it look like that was crazy it gos roand
after some secend another one come and do the same
content.summary: There was1 at first it was spining and go around  it goas up amd downafter that another one come i have pictur of one of them

content.detailedDescription:
We are camping at loch lomond when we saw around 3pm a ufo hovering above the trees and it looked like it came from
the top of the mountain.
when it got dark we saw it again and we saw two bright lights like stars and they where hovering above the trees again. we saw another red one on the waters edge. we then saw some and they came right over towards a house on the opposite side of the loch. they where making a light shape like red yellow and hovering above the lake and flashings. we saw one orb entity right by the tent and it moved quickly . this went on for two to three hours until it stopped. we did not take any photos of it as my phone battery had died.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo sighting loch lomond

content.detailedDescription: On 11th aug' 2017, i was standing infront of an office at lashio, sothern shan state, myanmar. i saw something flying very quickly and lost in the clouds. it is white in colour and the shape looks like a cigar. it doesn't look like a plane or a bird. and it doesn't look like a missile too. there is no smoke tail behind the object. i thought it is a ufo.
content.summary: White cigar shaped flying object

content.detailedDescription:
I recently visited stonehenge, i was taking numerous photos of the site and it was only when reviewing them later i noticed on one of them taken at 18.41pm, a small what looks like a hovering object above the site. i have other photos from within a minute or so before, and after this shot, that do not show the same object in any of the frame. 
i did not hear any noise, or notice anything arrive, or leave whilst i was taking the pictures.

the object can be seen to the right of the picture, about half way between the top of the stones and the sun, it is very small i have attached also a zoomed in picture.
content.summary: Sighting over stonehenge

content.detailedDescription: Saturday night around 10:30 pm we where walking our dog and we had spotted a strange red orange light hovering high up in the air. after it had hovered about 15 feet forward the light shut off and it zoomed up into outer space. from our view we could see it going up without a light on and at a high rate of speed.
content.summary: Saw it and then it shot at high speed into the outer space

content.detailedDescription: I was at my home in phoenix in the back yard with the kids and i saw a tiny dot in the sky.  it appeared to move slowly and i thought it could be a small balloon, but i took pictures of it with my dls camera using a telephoto lens to zoom in, and it looked much bigger.  it was the shape of an astronaut, or a scuba diver, floating in the sky.  i wanted a closer look so i viewed the images on my computer and i even noticed a smaller dot near the object, and realized they must have been much farther away but when i went back out to take more pictures but it was gone.
content.summary: It looked like an astronaut, or a scuba diver, but just floating in the air. there was also a small white dot near it that it seemed to follow.

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i in wisconsin dells,wi over the fourth for vacation.  at around 8;30pm went mini golfing.  close to 9pm i happened to glance up and observe a pulsating orangish object slowly flying over treetops about 100-500 feet above.  i fumbled with my phone to take video and girlfriend also witnessed object.  i managed to capture a minute or so of the object until the camera could no longer focus on it.  after which time it had gotten to a more lighted portion of the sky and i could make out a definite structure that was not lit.  about 2-5 min. after i could no longer see it a helicopter appeared, taking the same tack and flying in the same direction.  however i did not record that.
content.summary: Saw pulsating object slowly flying over treetops about 100-500 ft above

content.detailedDescription:
I was visiting a friend's house and was outside keeping my smoker friends company. not a smoker and with nothing to do i was staring at the stars. the stars up in the mountains are so much brighter. i noticed an orangish light that was moving. i first thought it was a plane but then it changed directions and flew in circles, sometimes making figure eights. i then noticed the other one that was similar i'm appearance. i asked for my number frnds to look and for my husband to come outside. they all verified they were seeing the same. after what i think was about 20 minutes the objects started to fade. once they were gone i saw nothing else. 

sometime later a unmarked police vehicle with lights but no sure and a large suv blew by on joy road. i have no idea if that had anything to do with anything, but it was unusual for the area. 

i am a skeptic. before this i was a closed sketic, the type that rolls their eyes at the mention of aliens beyond movies and tv. now i'm not so sure.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Two lights which appeared like planes flying in circles around each other.

content.detailedDescription:
I had gone to bed at around 2 in the morning. when i woke up i was standing in the middle of my room with my cloths turned inside out and there was a fading blue/white light coming in from my window. my dog that i had gone to bed with was in her carrier and the door was closed and locked. i went back to bed thinking that it was just sleep walking and nothing more. i woke up around 7:30 am and was feeling like i hadn't slept all night. i also noticed that even though it was between 60 and 65 degrees in my room i was sweating like it was over 90 and i was feeling extremely nauseous. i took 3 steps away from my bed and felt something in my left knee shift before i experienced the worst pain i have ever felt before. i have been shot in the past and that's exactly what it felt like. since then my left knee has been hurting all day without relief.

after the incident when i first work up i heard a pulsating buzzing sound that seemed to diminish as the light faded outside. i previously filed a report about entities in my bedroom both here in silverton, id (case #: 70020) as well as in spokane valley, wa (case #s: 55319, 55910) when i lived there.

at this point in time i am thinking about getting a motion activated ir game camera and using it in my room for a couple nights to a week to see if i'm able to catch any of this on camera for hard evidence.
content.summary: Once again vistied, this time there may have been a physical contact

content.detailedDescription: tonight 21 2017 12:30 am i walk out to my garage there's nothing by the staircase i get a notification that my  security cameras picked up image review the cameras and there's a being that my camera froze on i can't play the video so i was able to screenshot the being on my phone. from that night video was was erase still don't know how the the videos got deleted
content.summary: My security cameras picked up this being and then cameras froze would not play full video

content.detailedDescription:
My friends and me went to germany to compete in this disc golf tournament. we left in the evening but it was still light outside. i was lying in the back of the car checking out the nature thinking about this tournament. my friends were in the front talking about disc golf and such. i am looking over the horizon when i see this light in the distance. first thought i had, helicopter.
it wasn't high up somewhere in the sky, it was at that level an helicopter would fly. if i had to guess... around 200 meters. i thought it was an helicopter because the only thing i saw was a ball of light.I thought; they are looking for somebody but that made no sense at all because this chopper went over land and water and fields...
but this chopper/light/ball, did not change course at all...It just kept of flying towards us. but we were driving on the highway...I have no clue how fast it went but it took awhile to get to us. not really to us but up in the sky towards our direction. then it stopped. sat there for 20 seconds and just when i wanted to ask my friends what the hell is that, it went another direction(90 degrees) but really fast and poof, it was gone. 
right then i was baffled and that doesn't happen very often ;-)
i am high gifted...I know stuff ;-)

we do not have planes or choppers or anything flying that can disappear within a second out of eyes view.
so i am pretty sure that what i saw was not from this earth.

and now we are 30 years later and still have no clue what i saw that evening.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ball of light travels in a line, stops and goes another direction.

content.detailedDescription: after several seconds i went outside because the airport is about 2 mi. off and planes fly over a lot each night.I am use to their sound.But this was very load and scary.The sound was like a train but slow and hummed and dull. i finally went outside because it sounded like it was so huge.The lights were just passing over head and pulsating in a line up.The lights were headed for our airport but this string of lights were several lights which took up the whole horizon.I noticed a plane coming in towards the airport with a red blinking light.I know they must have seen the lights,it would have been terrifying the sound.The lights took turns across the sky each pulsating off and on as the next light came on in alternating in sequence.Then there was a light below the line up(same color),all the lights were white.The lower light joined in the alternating of the others,each taking it's turn.Whatever it was the lights were perfectly spaced in a large line and flying really low and slow.I couldn't believe that our airport didn't put out something.I've never seen anything like it before.We live really remote in canyons and this was coming from the south.
content.summary: First load hum,loader than plane which go over my path.Dull pulsate hum and all in line lighted across sky,low and pulsating off each one and then one below.Lights took turns.This was a large area but spaced.Very slow seed,dark sky but load and hum .

content.detailedDescription:
It started back in early july, i was studying coding. my 3 year old daughter said that there was monster in the other room and was scared. i tried to comfort her and just passed it off as spirits.
fast forward to present, my daughter would say the the monsters are in her head and watch her,my wife asked her what color they where and she said "grey". so i had a thought and google gray alien pics. i scrolled down and asked her if these where the monsters and if so which one do they look like. she picked the pic of the one from the area 51 interview. on aug 10th my wife asked her what do they do and she said they hurt her and they are mean, she won't say how. well i played the video for my oldest son because i was telling him about the situation and she heard the interview with the grey talking and came running and said i want to see. she didn't know i was playing the video and only heard the sound. if this is real i am afraid for my 3 year old daughters life and do not know who else to contact.
i understand that children have over active imagination but we don't really watch movies to cause this type of situation to arise. i really need to talk to someone about our situation because the frequency of her saying she sees monster is becoming more and more as the days go on.
content.summary: N/a

content.detailedDescription:
I work for a defense contractor in the reading area. my boss told me that one evening while there were cscattered clouds he heard a loud propeller sounding noise and through the broken cloud light he could see 5 predator-lke drones flying in a chevron formation making the approach to i believe heritage field a private airstrip.

he called his close friend that is high up at limerick and asked hime had he heard anything about it.  his friend told him off the record that these have been brought in by the military to monitor 24v hours a day,  the influx of ufo sightings in the restricted airspace around limerick. he told him the ufo's are not military and have been a concern so much that the government is spending serious resources on what is hovering over the site.  there is a military base near (within 50 miles i believe) the power plant and any attempt they have made to observe or chase the objects has been futile.

the date i have posted is approximate because as far as i know the drones may still be in the area
the time i listed is the time the drones arrived but the sightings were almost nightly and lasted through out the night
content.summary: Ufos above limerick nuclear power plant

content.detailedDescription:
I first noticed a star like object in the night sky which was moving and flashing blue, white and red. i went outside to view and record the object, i noticed there was another red pulsating object approaching the first object. i then noticed several other objects approaching. i then turned my attention to another object at a different position in the night sky so i began to record that. this object was also star like in the sky and flashing blue, white and red. the first recording did not save for some reason but the second video did and it was only when i watched the video i noticed the object i captured on the recording clearly changed shape from sphere to triangle to rectangle several times before moving at speed and teleporting and reappearing twice! i did not notice this with the naked eye but i have all this on video.
the event took place on feb 27th 2017 around 21:44 on a clear, starry night. interestingly there are no stars visible in the film which highlights how bright the object was. 
i also have another video recording from a separate sighting but this is by far the most interesting. i am happy to share my videos but when i uploaded them to twitter and facebook the quality was reduced.
i am not attaching the video footage until i have spoken to a representative from mufon.
content.summary: Star like objects in night sky

content.detailedDescription:
First observed object in the horizon. thought it was fighter jet but heard no 
noise
content.summary: Observed trail while driving to work.

content.detailedDescription: In august 1997 i was camping with my son and a few friends. when it got dark and a round huge ufo just seemed to appear.  it was a huge, round object that had multicolored lights flashing all over. there was a see through beam that seemed to be sucking up debris out of the forest floor!   the place we were all camping was applegate lake and all of that area around and further away used to be gold mining country.  you have to go through jacksonville oregon to get to the lake.   famous old gold mining town.  so this craft was there every night all night for a week!   really seemed to be sucking up trees and whatever else through this beam.  really amazing!!  one girl that was with us had severe anxiety seeing this she was so scared she almost walked off the cliff!   it seemed to affect all of us but in different ways.   made me dizzy and i felt like my thoughts were not mine!    we never saw this ufo arrive or depart.   was just all of a sudden there!  never in the daytime only night time.  this area seems to be a hot spot for ufos so it's not the first one i've seen but even though it was 20 years ago i remember it like it was yesterday
content.summary: We were camping at applefare lake for a week and this hovering craft with multicolored lights was there beam to the ground was sucking up stuff out of the forests.  that area is known for gold mining and berilim mines.  craft mined every night all night

content.detailedDescription: Sleep paralysis with stimulation.
content.summary: Sleep paralysis with stimulation

content.detailedDescription: At 12 40am i went out to my balcony to have a final cigarette before bed.It was a clear cloudless night and as i looked at the sky i noticed what i initially thought was a plane.I realised that it was moving but hovering in the same place.It was then that i also realized there was no sound whatsoever coming from it.This made me look at it more closely as i wasn't sure what this was.This is when i could see that it actually consisted of four lights forming the shape of a diamond.The top light and one diagonally beneath it were white and the other light diagonally beneath and the bottom light were both red.I knew this wasn't a plane or a helicopter because of the unusual formation of the lights and lack of sound.I watched as the cluster of lights,which were slowly flashing,slowly and silently began to move in a straight line in a northerly direction.As my balcony faces south,it slowly moved out of my line of vision.As i looked back to where i had originally spotted it hovering in the sky i was amazed to see yet another set of four lights hovering in the exact spot i had just seen the previous lights hovering.Again it was four lights forming the shape of a diamond but this time all four lights were red but weren't flashing.I was stunned to then see another set of four lights appear from what looked like roughly 50feet away from the red hovering lights.This third set of lights were exactly the same as the first set of lights which had now left my line of vision-diamond formation with two white and two red and flashing slowly.This formation seemed to appear out of thin air as i never seen it when i had noticed the four red hovering lights.This new set of lights i had noticed were moving in the same slow manner as the lights i saw at the start and began moving in the same northerly direction.As it moved the red lights which were hovering began to slowly move as if they were folloing the lights close by.As it began to follow,two of the red lights changed to white so that it now had the same appearance ss the other two objects or crafts or whatever these things were.At this point my heart rate was increasing as i knew i was witnessing something highly unusual.I ran into my bedroom to get my girlfriend ,who had just gone to bed,to come to the balcony and see what i was witnessing.I half expected them to have gone when we came back out but they were both there and still moving very slowly.We both watched as the set of lights which seemed to be getting followed changed direction from north to south almost as though it was circling behind the other set of lights behind it.We watched as it slowly circled round and i'm unsure whether it was because it was now facing us at a different angle but it's four lights were now white and suddenly two of the lights became very bright almost like the searchlight of a helicopter.It wasn't a helicopter though as these two bright lights didn't give off any sort of beam the way a helicopter searchlight would.This was all done in complete silence.They then seemed to be carrying on with the northerly direction of the first set of lights i had saw and as they did so they seemed to fade in front of our eyes until they simply looked lime a single point of white light.As we watched this,i saw what i can only describe as a white flash or flare come flying down towards the trees just along from our house.It came in at a 45degree angle and had a white trail of light behind it.As it got close enough to the tree where it looked like it might hit the tree it completely vanished.It also made no sound whatsoever.At this point my excitement turned slighty to anxiety as i was witnessing not only what appeared to be three ufo's but now it seemed that they were firing something from their craft.I don't know if it was some sorg of flare,laser or something else but i'm certain it came from the original set of lights i saw that had disappeared from view.This was one of the most exciting and scary things i have seen and leaves me in no doubt that we are definitely not alone.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Three diamond shaped cluster of lights close to each other which hovered then slowly moved off

content.detailedDescription:
Because the temperatures in spain have been so hot, we have taken to sitting out on the roof terrace in the late evening to enjoy the coolness and look at the night sky.
 
on monday we were looking out at the bright full moon which was in the southern aspect of the sky. the lower horizon was fairly misty in the valleys coming up from the coast, so the moon was beautiful. because it was so bright, i was curious as to how many stars we would see.
looking up towards the ne, my eye caught a bright flash of what could have been a star just uncovered by a cloud, then covered again - however, there was not a cloud in the sky.

curiosity made me keep looking in the area of the sky to try to figure out if it was a plane and its trajectory.
i know it was not a sattelite as we had observed one a few days previously as a single light travelling in a straight line across the sky from sse to nnw with no trail.
nor was it a shooting star, which we see regularly.
i pointed it out to my husband who confirmed that he too saw it and its eratic placement in the sky.

the second flash was about 8 seconds later heading towards the east.
the next one was back towards the north.
i sat down in order to 'frame' the area i was watching, using the posts and poles of the of the terrace, to have a reference in case i was wobbling.
the next few flashes i noted the direction changes were random, as if it were spiraling or looping the loop.
the time interval between flashes varied between 3 and 12 seconds appart.
as i was watching, and anticipating where the next one would be, i noted that associated with the flash was a pinpoint of light that i could follow with the naked eye. the bright flash seemed to eminate from this point every time.
after a final swirl of movement that i was able to clearly see, it flashed really bright and then the brighter dot streaked off leaving a faint trail, in a nw direction and was gone.

i felt intrigued and convinced that it was a ufo.

one thought i had was that if it was a craft with one surface that was more reflective than the others, then as it turned in flight, it may have flashed with the reflection of the bright moon that was in the nearly opposite quadrant of the sky. that would explain why i felt it was spiraling - almost 'playing'.

there are large eagles that soar during the day in the jimena area as the village is situated at the base of a castle that had value as a strategic point at the time of the moors and the romans. the apparent spiraling movements of the lights reminded me of their soaring flight with the air currents, and how they can disappear from view when end-on.

i have spoken about this to colleagues at work and was told that there are others who have witnessed exactly the same phenomenon in the same region, but viewing from further west - looking east and north over the national park.

please note, there is a supposed 'top secret' us base at 36.479370, -5.599288 - see file 2
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright flash of light that changed course and appeared to spiral bepore streaking off

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving my doctor's office at st clare hospital in lakewood washington. it was on or about june 8th 2016. i use a power wheelchair to access the community. i was waiting for the bus that would take me home. it was a very clear and unusually bright day. the fact that it was so bright made me notice the only cloud in the sky. the cloud was unlike any cloud i had ever seen in my life. it was a perfect circle that appeared to surround the sun which hurt my eyes to look in the direction of the sky. there was no center in the cloud it appeared to be a transparent circle framing the sun. even more unusual was there appeared to be a rainbow or prism effect around the cloud. the cloud formed a cirle around the sun and the rainbow circled the cloud. i grabbed my phone and snapped a couple of pictures because i thought that maybe it was a weather phenomenon causing this effect and i wanted to show it to my wife and family and investigate the cause of this apparition. i tuned my camera northward to snap a picture to show just how clear a day it was and to compare the contradicting phenomenon. i took 3 pictures of the cloud and 1 of the clear sky. just as i finished the photographs the bus pulled up. the driver asked my name got out of the bus and lowered the lift and allowed me to board. i put away my phone and talked to the driver who was not very interested in the strange cloud. later that afternoon my wife asked me if anything interesting happened at the doctor's office. i related the story to her about the cloud. i pulled my phone out of my pocket and showed her the photos i took. on the first picture there appeared to be a small dot in the picture near the sun. it was quite reflective and i thought maybe it was just a reflection or something electronic. i slid the picture to the left to view the next photo. this time the dot had moved from inside the cirlce to just below it in the 7 o'clock position. i enlarged the picture and boy did i get the shock of my life. the dot was actually an orb and there appeared to be something metallic on the surface and there were several of these small metallic strictures on the surface. again i slid the photo to the left with a swipe of my finger to reveal the next photo. somehow the next photo was a burst and with one click i had taken 3 pictures and in each one of the pictures the orb was in a different place in the cloud. i was impressed with the speed of the object. one more swipe and the picture of the clear sky to the north came into view. this was actually the first picture i took but because of the way the telephone stores the pictures it was the last picture to come into view. the picture revealed a tree along with the sky and a blue/green almost turquoise orb just under the lower branches of the tree. in this picture the orb was on its way to the cloud at the time that i snapped the picture. these pictures remain in my phone to this day and i  have only shown them to a select few associates. i have since come to realize that i  don't have the right to keep these things to myself, i should share them with the world.
content.summary: Observed perfect circle cloud rimmed by rainbow. took pictures did not look at pics until i got home
